channel.title: Electron on ZEN
channel.description: Recent content in Electron on ZEN

item.title: DeepinLinux下为electron安装sqlite3
item.description: https://newsn.net/say/electron-install-sqlite3.html 一行命令，从源码编译安装 npm install sqlite3@latest --build-from-source --runtime=electron --target=3.0.1 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/electron --save --target为electron的版本号。 不添加--dist-url参数会报错，但我原先已经在项

item.title: Electron窗口操作
item.description: 无边框窗口 https://electronjs.org/docs/api/frameless-window#创建无框窗口 mainWindow = new BrowserWindow({ width: 900, height: 700, frame: false

item.title: Electron初步
item.description: Electron文档 mkdir myapp cd myapp npm init 生成的package.json如下，然后添加一行"start": "electron ." { "name": "journal", "version": "1.0.0", "description": "", "main": "index.js", "scripts":
